author: jstrachan
msg: Patched the build file so that its no longer dependent on jars included in jexl

author: jstrachan
msg: Fixed namespace problem with static XML. The SOAP scripting example now works fine now; just need the HTTP taglib and it'll work fine.

author: jstrachan
msg: Added <j:include> tag to allow easy calling of other jelly scripts. Also got the root and current URL contexts working so uris can be relative to the root context, relative to the current context or absolute URLs

author: jstrachan
msg: Added support in the Context for getResource() to allow loading of resources via explicit URL or relative URI as well as a compile and run methods to invoke other jelly scripts from inside jelly. This needs testing but the code is just about there I think. Also fixed the invokeBody tag so that it works fine now - though it uses a private variable 'jelly.body' which is not ideal but works fine.
